<template lang="pug">
#app
  //- .title
  //-   h1 Mia Chen Work
  //- .content

  //-   .middle.col-10.col-lg-10.col-md-8.col-sm-11
  //-     h3 {{ game_title }}
  router-view
</template>
<script>
import { mapState } from "vuex";
import LeftBar from "./views/leftBar.vue";
export default {
  components: {
    LeftBar,
  },
  created(){
    if(process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production') this.$store.commit("setImagePath","/miachen_work/")
  },
  data() {
    return {};
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState({
      game_title: (state) => state.game_title,
    }),
  },
};
</script>
<style lang="sass">
@import "src/assets/sass/basic.sass"
</style>
<style lang="sass" scoped>
#app
  .title
    border-bottom: 2px solid
    text-align: center
    height: 6vh
    width: 100vw
  .content
    height: 94vh
    width: 100vw
    display: flex
    .left
      border-right: 1px solid
      height: 100%
    .middle
      height: 100%
      padding: 10px
//   font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
